name: Fazbear Horror 3
description:
In this game you are in a FNAF 3 location where you must survive six nights against the Springtrap and the Phantoms

Includes:

  • Six Nights and an Endless Mode
  • All characters from FNAF 3 and some more
  • Partial Free Roam
  • Voice Acting
  • Lots of Minigames
  • Lots of Easter Eggs

This is probably actually going to be the final game in the Fazbear Horror Series so enjoy ;)
Fazbear Horror 1: https://gamejolt.com/games/Fazbear/409206
Fazbear Horror 2: https://gamejolt.com/games/fazbear2/410944

I originally uploaded this game to gamejolt, check it out here:https://gamejolt.com/games/fazbear3/413626

also if you enjoyed this game be sure to follow and like, It means so much to me and I will follow you back ASAP!
